name: Secrets (Jajaben)
description:
Secrets is an experimental game about wonder. A game where powerups do not just boost your abilities, but change the way the game works.  In order to find every secret, you will need to think outside of the box.

This game was made 10 years ago for a game jam. It has its charm, but also a couple of flaws. This does tie into the theme of the game, however, so give it a go!

Controls (note: not everything works from the start of the game): 

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z or Up to jump
  • X to interact
  • B to place bombs
  • S saves the game (later on in the game)
  • C shows the map screen
  • W also does domething
